name: 王正豪
objective: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5.分散式同作控制   6.電腦安全 7. 排程模式
schedule:
1. OS Basics: 2-3 wks
Course Overview
Chap. 1, Overview of Operating Systems
Chap. 2, Operating System Structures

2. Process Manageement: 5-6 wks
Chap. 3, Process Concept
Chap. 4, Multithreaded Programming
Chap. 5, Process Scheduling
Chap. 6, Synchronization
Chap. 7, Deadlocks

3. Memory Management: 3-4 wks
Chap. 8, Memory Management Strategies
Chap. 9, Virtual Memory Management

4. Storage Management: 3-4 wks
Chap. 10, File System
Chap. 11, Implementing File Systems
Chap. 12, Secondary Storage
Chap. 13, I/O Systems

5. Advanced Topics: 1-2 wks
Selected topics from:
Chap. 14-15, System Protection & Security
Chap. 16-18, Distributed Operating Systems
Chap. 19-20, Special Purpose Systems
Chap. 21-23, Case Studies
scorePolicy:
Written and programming exercises: 30%
Attendances and in-class exercises: 30%
Midterm & final exam: 40%
materials:
- Textbook: Operating System Concepts, 8th ed., by Abraham Silberschatz, Peter Baer Galvin, and Greg Gagne, John Wiley & Sons, Inc. (新月)
. http://codex.cs.yale.edu/avi/os-book/os8c/
- References: Modern Operating Systems, 3rd ed., by Andrew S. Tanenbaum, Prentice-Hall, 2007
- Latest news available on: http://www.ntut.edu.tw/~jhwang/OS/
